key.name: ads_desc
key.value: To activate AdMob in iOS App you need to indicate your Ad Unit ID. Click here to learn how to acquire it.

key.name: email_verify_template_html
key.value:
Hello,

To complete registering your profile for {$site_name}, please enter the following code into {$site_name} app: {$code}.

If this message was sent to you in error, simply ignore it and your email will not be used anywhere.

Thank you,
Administration
{$site_name}

key.name: email_verify_template_text
key.value:
Hello,
To complete registering your profile for {$site_name} ({$site_url}), please enter the following code into {$site_name} app: {$code}.
If this message was sent to you in error, simply ignore it and your email will not be used anywhere.
Thank you, Administration {$site_name} {$site_url}

key.name: flurry_key_desc
key.value:
To obtain free Flurry API keys for your applications, please sign in to your Flurry Analytics account, or sign up for a free account if you don’t have it; Proceed with creation of API key for iOS platform.

By enabling Flurry Analytics you will be able to obtain basic apps user tracking statistics. To receive tracking for user credits/memberships conversions you need to have in-app purchases enabled, which is done through performing or ordering Basic Customization Service.

key.name: push_new_profile_view
key.value: Someone viewed your profile. Check them out!

key.name: push_new_wink
key.value: {$sender} winked at you, showing their interest. Wink back or send a message in return.

key.name: push_pass_phrase_desc
key.value: Pass phrase used to protect the certificate.

key.name: push_pem_file_desc
key.value: SSL certificate ( *.pem ) that your push server uses to make a secure connection to APNS

key.name: push_speed_match
key.value: Congratulations! You have a new SpeedMatch connection. Now strike a conversation with {$opponent}

key.name: settings_billing_enable_description
key.value: Basic Customization is required to enable in-app purchases. Contact SkaDate Support to request Basic Customization service.

key.name: smart_banner_desc
key.value: Promote your App for any visitor using iOS

key.name: user_reported_notification_html
key.value:
Content posted by a site user has been flagged as inappropriate (illegal, offensive, spam, or otherwise breaching the site’s TOS). Please take immediate action by reviewing the reported profile, removing all offensive content and banning the offending user if necessary.

Flagged profile: {$userUrl}
Report reason: {$reason}
Report submitted by: {$reportedUserUrl}

key.name: user_reported_notification_text
